it.polito.computervision.gestures

Interface Gesture

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractGesture, ClickGesture, OneHandGesture, PanGesture, TwoHandGesture, ZoomGesture

    public interface Gesture
    Represents a 2D gesture.
    Author:
    Giovanni Piumatti

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      GestureState getCurrentState() 
      java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> getData() 
      java.lang.String getName() 
      boolean isLive() 
      void reset()
      Resets this gesture's GestureState to NOT_DETECTED
      GestureState updateState(java.util.List<HandData> hands, java.util.List<HandData> gestureHands)
      Updates the state of the gesture

    • Method Detail

      • updateState

        GestureState updateState(java.util.List<HandData> hands,
                       java.util.List<HandData> gestureHands)
        Updates the state of the gesture
        Parameters:
        hands - The list of HandData of the new frame
        gestureHands - (out) The list of HandData this gesture is tracking
        Returns:
        the GestureState this gesture is in after the call

      • getCurrentState

        GestureState getCurrentState()
        Returns:
        The GestureState this gesture is currently in

      • getName

        java.lang.String getName()
        Returns:
        the unique name of this gesture

      • isLive

        boolean isLive()
        Returns:
        true if it's a live gesture, false otherwise

      • getData

        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> getData()
        Returns:
        arbitrary data associated to the specific gesture

      • reset

        void reset()
        Resets this gesture's GestureState to NOT_DETECTED
